level.text: 5907.1 A nurse practitioner shall adhere to the standards set forth in themerican Nurses Association’s “Code of Ethics,” as they may bemended or republished from time to time.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 3505, 3507 (May 12, 1989); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 11751 (December 27, 2002); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7228 (July 23, 2004).
